alert.note: Alert for Brooke; Hancock (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 27 at 1:35PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG WIND THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT THE AREA THROUGH 215 PM EST... At 134 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Waynesburg to near Dennison to 11 miles southeast of Byesville. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Weirton, Steubenville, Hermitage, Sharon, Salem, East Liverpool, Columbiana, East Palestine, Sharpsville, Barnesville, Wellsville, and Cadiz. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio between mile markers 191 and 211. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
